enabling_node_inclusion: Fa'agata le fa'aogaina o node, fa'amolemole fa'atali...
enabling_node_exclusion: Fa'aagaaga le fa'aogaina o node, fa'amolemole fa'atali...
inclusion_message: Oomi le ki i luga o le masini e te manaʻo e faʻaopoopo i lenei fesoʻotaʻiga.
exclusion_message: Oomi le ki i luga o le masini e te manaʻo e aveese mai lenei fesoʻotaʻiga.
task_duration_notice: O lenei galuega atonu e o'o atu i {{timeout}} sekone e fa'auma ai.
adding_node: Fa'aopoopo {{node}} o le masini, fa'amolemole fa'atali...
removing_node: Ave'ese {{node}} o le masini, fa'amolemole fa'atali...
node_added: Ua manuia le fa'aopoopoina o {{node}} o le masini
node_removed: Ua aveese {{node}} o le masini
association_description: O nei masini e auina atu lipoti i nodes o loʻo aofia i vaega faʻalapotopotoga. Ina ia mafai ona maua lipoti mai lenei masini, ia aofia ai le node 1 (le pule) i vaega faʻalapotopotoga.
generic_parameter_description: Tu'u le numera fa'amaufa'ailoga ma le tau e fa'atulaga.
refresh_ports_button: Toe faafou le lisi o taulaga
calibration_parameter_not_set: E le o setiina le numera o le fa'avasegaina
calibration_parameter_number: Numera fa'amau (silasila i le tusi lesona)
